# sabnzbd Provider

The SABnzbd provider allows you to manage SABnzbd configuration as infrastructure. It supports managing servers, categories, and other settings through the SABnzbd API.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configure the SABnzbd provider
provider "sabnzbd" {
  # URL of your SABnzbd instance
  url = var.sabnzbd_url

  # API key from SABnzbd Config -> General -> API Key
  # Can also be set via SABNZBD_API_KEY environment variable
  api_key = var.sabnzbd_api_key
}

variable "sabnzbd_api_key" {
  description = "SABnzbd API key"
  type        = string
  sensitive   = true
}

variable "sabnzbd_url" {
  description = "URL of your SABnzbd instance"
  type        = string
  default     = "http://localhost:8080"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) The API key for authenticating with SABnzbd. Can also be set via the `SABNZBD_API_KEY` environment variable.
- `url` (String) The URL of the SABnzbd instance (e.g., `http://localhost:8080`). Can also be set via the `SABNZBD_URL` environment variable.
